bullet: Easily building Static Site Generation (SSG) and Server-side Rendering (SSR) websites
Deploying to CDN for very cheap due to static rendering
Building static websites with powerful dynamic tools -- React, GraphQL
HelmetJS for security and SEO baked in
name: Gatsby
desc: I've dabbled in Gatsby and am accustomed to its offerings. I know how to use its suite of developer tools which make it a breeze to set up headless sites and to generate static sites while leveraging the power of React and GraphQL
